resources.string: Galle is a beautiful city with rich history and stunning architcture. The highlight of my visit was exploring the Galle Fort. The fort is well-preserved and offers stunning views of the ocean. I alse enjoyed wandering through the narrow streets and discovering charming cafes and boutiquesGalle is a beautiful city with rich history and stunning architcture. The highlight of my visit was exploring the Galle Fort. The fort is well-preserved and offers stunning views of the ocean. I alse enjoyed wandering through the narrow streets and discovering charming cafes and boutiquesGalle is a beautiful city with rich history and stunning architcture. The highlight of my visit was exploring the Galle Fort. The fort is well-preserved and offers stunning views of the ocean. I alse enjoyed wandering through the narrow streets and discovering charming cafes and boutiques

Kandy, the cultural capital of Sri Lanka, a World Heritage Site sits pretty in a valley surrounded by rings of mountains, 115km away from the seaport of Colombo. Right in the heart of the city center of Kandy is the man-made lake called Kiri Muhuda (Sinhala: the sea of milk), the one and only decorative lake in Sri Lanka. All other thousands of man-made reservoirs in Sri Lanka are developed primarily for the purposes of irrigation, and secondarily for the purposes of general use and wildlife conservation.

All other thousands of man-made reservoirs in Sri Lanka are developed primarily for the purposes of irrigation, and secondarily for the purposes of general use and wildlife conservation.
